remarks: Closure of polynomial degree in the extended reals.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 19-Mar-2015.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 27-Jul-2019.)
statement:
mdegxrcl.d $e |- D = ( I mDeg R ) $.
mdegxrcl.p $e |- P = ( I mPoly R ) $.
mdegxrcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` P ) $.
mdegxrcl $p |- ( F e. B -> ( D ` F ) e. RR* ) $.
